name: A short plateformer
description:
Disclaimer : Sounds and UI sprites are premade, and the movement is based on some code I revisited this week.

Resolution locked at 1920*1080 !

Gamepad recommended

Mouse&Keyboard :

- Move : ADWS (auto mapping if you have AZERTY or another keyboard)

- Jump : Space

- Dash : E

- Camera : Mouse movements + right click

- Camera zoom : Mouse scroll

- Camera auto look : Mouse scroll click

Gamepad :

- Move : Left Stick

- Jump : South button

- Dash : Right trigger

- Camera : Right Stick

- Camera zoom : Right/Left shoulder

- Camera auto zoom : Left trigger
